ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You will have a wage which never-fails.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is surely reward unending for you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and surely yours shall be a never-ending reward,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You will certainly receive a never-ending reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed for you is an unlimited reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, for you will be reward that is not Mamnun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely you shall have a reward never to be cut off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely thou shalt have a wage unfailing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! thine verily will be a reward unfailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Most surely, you will have a never ending reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily thine shall be a hire unending."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and yours indeed will be an everlasting reward,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, verily for thee is a Reward unfailing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, for you (O Muhammad SAW) will be an endless reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, there is an unfailing wage for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In fact, you will have a reward that will never end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, for you is a reward uninterrupted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:3] And assuredly you will have an unfailing reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! thine) O Muhammad (verily will be a reward) in the Garden for the prophethood and Islam bestowed upon you (unfailing) undiminished, unspoilt and blameless.
